parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Power Loss and Engine Stopping
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of steering power and engine stopping can lead to accidents, especially when driving on highways, and can put the driver and passengers at risk of injury or death.
symptoms: The vehicle's steering wheel displays a red warning symbol with an exclamation mark

accompanied by a warning sound; the steering power is lost or reduced; the engine stops; the vehicle becomes unresponsive; the "Steering Power Low" message appears on the dashboard; the vehicle shakes or bucks; the vehicle dies and will not restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system, including the battery or alternator, can cause the engine to stop, leading to a loss of power steering and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle's engine stops; the "Engine Stopped" message appears on the dashboard; the "Steering Power Low" message appears on the dashboard; the vehicle becomes unresponsive; the vehicle dies and will not restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress and Electrical System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress into the electrical system can cause the engine to stop, leading to a loss of power steering and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle's engine stops; the "Engine Stopped" message appears on the dashboard; the "Steering Power Low" message appears on the dashboard; the vehicle becomes unresponsive; the vehicle dies and will not restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The compromised windshield quality can lead to cracks or shattering due to minor road debris, potentially causing injuries to passengers, especially those in the front seats.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters due to unnoticeable debris
loss of confidence in the vehicle's safety
and fear of future incidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaws and ergonomic issues can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents, and discomfort or inconvenience for the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Lack of hatch release button
no tune knob on the radio
difficulty opening and closing doors
uncomfortable door armrests
gearshift placement issues
and limited customization options on the touchscreen.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The distorted side mirror can cause eye strain, discomfort, and potentially lead to accidents due to the driver's impaired visibility.
symptoms: Distorted image in the driver's side mirror
eye strain
and discomfort.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The recurring alignment issues can cause uneven tire wear, reduced vehicle stability, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: Alignment issues persist despite adjustments
uneven tire wear
and reduced vehicle stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Failure to Stop Vehicle
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal to stop the vehicle can lead to accidents, injuries, and damage to the vehicle, as well as potentially cause harm to other road users.
symptoms: The brake pedal is depressed
but the vehicle does not stop as intended
requiring the driver to take evasive action to avoid a crash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The squealing or squeaking noise from the front brakes can be a sign of worn or faulty brake components, which can lead to reduced braking performance and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: A squealing or squeaking noise is heard from the front brakes when applying light to moderate braking pressure at low speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden unintended acceleration can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents, damage to the vehicle, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly without input from the driver
often when the driver is attempting to brake or slow down
the brake warning light illuminates
the vehicle accelerates even when the driver's foot is off the accelerator pedal.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the moon roof can cause injury to the driver and occupants from flying glass, and potentially lead to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The moon roof shatters suddenly without any apparent cause
showering the driver and occupants with glass
and potentially causing injuries
especially to the eyes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Puddle/Courtesy Lights on Doors
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of puddle/courtesy lights on doors can create a hazardous situation when opening doors in dark environments, potentially leading to accidents or injuries to pedestrians, cyclists, or occupants.
symptoms: The doors do not have puddle/courtesy lights
which can make it difficult for oncoming vehicles
pedestrians
or cyclists to see when doors are opening
increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
